tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robot_performance_metrics (
  robot_id UUID,
  performance_metric_name VARCHAR(255),
  performance_metric_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE RobotEvents (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id UUID,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES RobotMetrics(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    metric_date DATE,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    metric_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    error_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_status (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    battery_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    error_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE robot_history (
    robot_id INT,
    mission_id INT,
    distance_travelled FLOAT,
    time_taken INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE mission_logs (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);
